name: MintyMint
tagline: Web & Mobile Development for startups and SME's
description:
MintyMint is more than just a team of highly qualified web developers and designers - we are experts who reveal the potential of your idea at all stages of product creation.
Our mission
To build and implement technologies in a way that will grow and scale any business in the world.
Our motto
"The software is not working, unless it makes someone's life easier"
About us
Extensive experience with MVPs, startups and small business environments, as well as complex projects, where full-stack skills, out-of-the-box thinking and high attention to detail are the key.
We exist to solve biggest business challenges through creative application of design thinking and technology solutions. MintyMint is the bridge between your ideas and technology. We will walk you through, advise the most appropriate tools, and help you bring to life even the boldest ideas.
